tts-init.description: Install MLX dependencies and download model (~4GB)
tts-init.instruction: Install MLX voice cloning dependencies and download the model

tts-start.description: Start TTS server to keep model warm

tts-stop.description: Stop the TTS server to reclaim GPU memory (up to 4GB)

tts-status.description: Check TTS server status (running/stopped, port, model)
tts-status.instruction: Check if TTS server is running

say.description: Speak text directly using TTS (smoke test)
say.instruction: Speak the provided text using TTS

summary-say.description: Summarize long text and speak the summary
summary-say.instruction: Summarize the provided text and speak it

tts-config.instruction: Run the wizard command to see current settings and available options, then use AskUserQuestion to let the user select a playback speed (1.0x Slow, 1.3x Normal, 1.6x Fast, 2.0x Turbo). After selection, run set command with the chosen speed.
